Installation
-----------

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install apkger

Quick Start
----------

1. Install the package:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install apkger

2. Run the configuration wizard:

.. code-block:: bash

    apkger --configure

3. Add vocabulary words to ~/.config/anki_packager/vocabulary.txt

4. Generate cards:

.. code-block:: bash

    apkger

For more information, visit https://github.com/yaoyhu/anki_packager
